extendedInfo.description: â â â 2013 OFFICIAL DSA preparation materials  â â â  Includes Car Driving Theory Test and Official Hazard Perception Test Preparation Modules  â â âThis app is all youâll ever need to pass your UK Car Driving Theory test! It combines 2 top rated applications in one and lets you prepare for both the theory test and the Hazard Perception part! Simply press the Option Key and you will have an option to switch between the two modes (Option Key is usually located to the left from Home Key; it is a physical button situated directly below the display).Main features are:â Regularly updated. 2013 ready! â Complete. Includes ALL Latest Official DSA Revision Theory Test questions and answers as well as FULL Official DSA Knowledge And Understanding Information for each Theory Test question. â 10 Full Official DSA Videos With Explanationsâââ ANTI CHEATING MECHANISM âââ Check whether your clicking style has a potential to be judged as inappropriate by DVLAâ Extremely easy to useâ Works offline. Get as much training as you need when you need it. â Select any number of videos for your practice testâ Try your skills in the Mock Theory Test as many times as you wish! â Comprehensive statistics average score and the number of clicks during last attemptâ Hazard Perception test overview â in addition to the official introduction we have compiled some very useful information about the test which will help you to better understand what to do and how to succeed!

reviews.title: Fantastic app
reviews.comment: Such a great app. Passed using this and a disc but i think this played the main part. So user friendly and well worth the \302\2432.50. Can\'t fault.
reviews.author: Carl bloor

reviews.title: Excellent app! Really useful.
reviews.comment: Practical information and chance to practice all skills needed for the theory test. Very comprehensive and easy to use.
reviews.author: Nicola Watson-May

reviews.title: Excellent app great job to ya
reviews.comment: I like it it\'s easy and soft to use. Does what I want and so I really appreciate that. Thanks download this app like Now
reviews.author: aly camara

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Had theory today and passed with this app thanks
reviews.author: Mark Lafferty

reviews.title: 50/50 - AWESOME
reviews.comment: Yahoo 50/50..and 61/75 (HP). just one day of reading/practice... just awesome!
reviews.author: Minhaj Uddin

reviews.title: Well made and fit for purpose
reviews.comment: Good price conisdering HPT is bundled in too, shows you a replay indicating when you should have clicked to help you understand how HPT software works. Test question part is great too :).
reviews.author: Andrew Bell

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Passed first tim pretty much solely using this app :). 47/50 58/70
reviews.author: Aaron Clifford

reviews.title: Love it!!!
reviews.comment: This is one of the only apps I was willing to pay for as I felt it will be useful revision. Covers all the main topics and the hazard perception videos are great. Bit too pricey but worth it! :D
reviews.author: evebryans

reviews.title: Recommended
reviews.comment: My driving instructor recommended this to me ...hopefully I will pass theory ...
reviews.author: Joshua Griffiths

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Helped me pass no problems!
reviews.author: Joseph Moore

reviews.title: Perfect app
reviews.comment: Has all the same questions as the test and has the hazard perception too . This will definitely help you pass
reviews.author: Nathan Walker

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: It\'s great for both multiple choice and hazard perception practice.
reviews.author: Asish Aryal

reviews.comment: It is excellent and well worth the 5 stars when it actually works, i paid the \302\2432.50 required to unlock all questions and hazard preception but when i go into my app it only shows some of the topics are unlocked and i have to go to my app store as if to buy it again and it says open so a bit of a mess about when i want to practice. When i am actually in the unlocked app it is brilliant though for the mess about ive knocked 2 stars off
reviews.author: Mark Stout

reviews.title: Best app ever !!!!!!!
reviews.comment: Passed my test first time. All the questions came out in the actual test.
reviews.author: edesiri gabari

reviews.title: Wont open
reviews.comment: Purchased app..never been able to use it as it says somethin about the licence..waste of my money n time
reviews.author: rebecca thomas

reviews.title: Really good
reviews.comment: Worth every penny.
reviews.author: Leroy Hibberd

reviews.title: 100% fantastic
reviews.comment: Such an amazing price for what is a pure quality app. Hazard perception is top dog, the widest selection of questions I\'ve ever seen on an app too. 100/100 thoroughly recommend.
reviews.author: Anthony Wheeler

reviews.comment: Excellent apps. Really helped me to pass the test easily. Thank you.
reviews.author: Hi Sudipa

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Got everything you could ever need on it. Hopefully will let me pass. !
reviews.author: Kieran Jenkins

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Thought I\'d brush up on my knowledge. Passed first time without revising!
reviews.author: David Elstob
